title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Mix the cooked spaghetti with the pancetta and garlic.
Add the egg mixture and toss until creamy.
Season with salt and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Sauté onions in a pan until golden.
Add tomato puree and cook until thickened.
Add the grilled chicken and cream.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish made with fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan or wok.
Add garlic and ginger, and sauté for 1 minute.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, and snap peas.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
